DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Al38583 Ophthalmic Solution safe effective reduce tear eosinophil level 5-8 hour Conjunctival Allergen Challenge ( CAC ) .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Efficacy AL-38583 Reduction Tear Eosinophil Count Following Conjunctival Allergen Challenge
DOC.criteria: Have positive bilateral CAC reaction ( > 2 itch > conjunctival redness ) cat hair , cat dander , dust mite , cockroach and/or dog dander within 10 minute instillation last titration allergen Visit 1 Have know allergy study medication ( ) component ( ex. , dexamethasone , benzalkonium chloride )
